text: Photos : Shocking celebrity splits Singer and Destiny's Child member Michelle Williams announced in December that she and sports chaplain Chad Johnson had ended their engagement. The couple announced in April that they planned to marry and were the subject of the OWN reality series ` ` Chad loves Michelle'' which focused on their intensive pre - marital counseling. Hide Caption 1 of 65 Photos : Shocking celebrity splits Olympic gymnast Mary Lou Retton shared on ` ` Dancing With the Stars'' that she and husband Shannon Kelley had quietly divorced in February after 27 years of marriage. The couple are the parents of four daughters. Hide Caption 2 of 65 Photos : Shocking celebrity splits Angelina Jolie Pitt filed for divorce from husband actor Brad Pitt in September 2016.
